templateOptions.label: ClientId
templateOptions.description: The ClientId to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: ClientSecret
templateOptions.description: The ClientSecret to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: TokenUrl
templateOptions.description: The TokenUrl to authorize with the API. e.g. https://idp-a.ecare.nu/identity

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to the API. e.g. https://service-scim-a.ecare.nu
